IMC Financial Markets | Build Engineer | Chicago, IL | ONSITE VISA | Full-time | http://www.imc.com

Our trading system encompasses more technology stacks than ever before as we continue to deliver low-latency solutions for our trading strategies. At the same time, our development organization is growing steadily in order to tackle new challenges. Both of these mean that the simplicity and speed of our build environment is more valuable and more challenging than ever.

As a build engineer at IMC, you will continually identify and implement improvements to the software delivery process, from targeted, iterative refinements to sweeping architectural redesigns, from improving code modularity and build times to releasing a fully-tested artifact. We're looking for someone who will leverage their previous experience in this space to make a mark.

Full Build Engineer posting: https://imc.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/IMC_USA/job/Chicago/Build-...

If you have questions, email me at the address listed in my profile with "HNBUILD" in the subject.
